mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_post(title, content, author) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{author})
mapper.select: SELECT id, status, title, content, author, view_count, created_at, updated_at, CASE WHEN created_at != updated_at THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_updated FROM t_board_post WHERE id=#{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board_post SET title=#{deletedTitle}, status='DELETED' WHERE id=#{postId}
